languages.text: {n}Грудная клетка друкари распахивается, кожа рвется с влажным хлюпаньем. На мгновение вы видите внутренние органы, покрытые странным налетом и бесформенными наростами похожих на грибы опухолей. Там, где должно быть сердце, свернулась блестящая прозрачная каракатица, присосавшаяся к черным трубкам вен. Мерзкий моллюск издает стон, и в лицо вам ударяет струя едкой жидкости. Вы ослеплены, судорога сводит горло и не дает вздохнуть, тело заходится в конвульсиях боли. Свет гаснет молниеносно.{/n}

{n}The Haemonculus's rib cage opens wide, the skin around it tearing with a wet squelch. You catch a glimpse of his internal organs coated with a strange film and riddled with shapeless growths and mushroom-like tumours. Where one would expect to see a heart, you see instead a glistening, translucent mollusc that has attached itself to the xenos's veins. The revolting thing lets out a groan, and a stream of caustic liquid burns your face. Blinded, you start thrashing as a horrible spasm seizes your throat and prevents you from breathing and your body convulses in pain. The light around you instantly fades.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Грудная клетка друкари распахивается, кожа рвется с влажным хлюпаньем. На мгновение вы видите внутренние органы, покрытые странным налетом и бесформенными наростами похожих на грибы опухолей. Там, где должно быть сердце, свернулась блестящая прозрачная каракатица, присосавшаяся к черным трубкам вен. Мерзкий моллюск издает стон, и в лицо вам ударяет струя едкой жидкости. Вы ослеплены, судорога сводит горло и не дает вздохнуть, тело заходится в конвульсиях боли. Свет гаснет молниеносно.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハモンキュラスの胸郭が大きく開き、その周囲の肌が湿ったような音を立てて引き裂かれる。そこには、奇妙な膜に覆われ、不定形の腫瘍やキノコのようなふくらみが隙間なく生えている内臓のようなものが垣間見える。心臓があるべき場所には、キラキラと光る半透明の軟体生物が異種族の静脈に張り付いているのが見えた。その嫌悪感を抱かせるものが唸り声をあげ、あなたの顔へと焼け付くような液体を放つ。目がくらみ、喉が恐ろしいほどに痙攣して呼吸ができなくなり、身体が痛みに悶える。周囲の光が、瞬く間に消え去る。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus's rib cage opens wide, the skin around it tearing with a wet squelch. You catch a glimpse of his internal organs coated with a strange film and riddled with shapeless growths and mushroom-like tumours. Where one would expect to see a heart, you see instead a glistening, translucent mollusc that has attached itself to the xenos's veins. The revolting thing lets out a groan, and a stream of caustic liquid burns your face. Blinded, you start thrashing as a horrible spasm seizes your throat and prevents you from breathing and your body convulses in pain. The light around you instantly fades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハモンキュラスの胸郭が大きく開き、その周囲の肌が湿ったような音を立てて引き裂かれる。そこには、奇妙な膜に覆われ、不定形の腫瘍やキノコのようなふくらみが隙間なく生えている内臓のようなものが垣間見える。心臓があるべき場所には、キラキラと光る半透明の軟体生物が異種族の静脈に張り付いているのが見えた。その嫌悪感を抱かせるものが唸り声をあげ、あなたの顔へと焼け付くような液体を放つ。目がくらみ、喉が恐ろしいほどに痙攣して呼吸ができなくなり、身体が痛みに悶える。周囲の光が、瞬く間に消え去る。{/n}

languages.text: {n}血伶人突然张开了胸腔，周围的皮肤发出了黏糊糊的吱吱声。你看到他的内脏包裹在古怪的薄膜之中，身体各处都长着不规则的增生物与蘑菇一样的肿瘤。你原本以为是心脏的地方，包裹着一只发光的半透明软体动物，附着在血伶人的血管上。那只令人作呕的怪物发出一声怪叫，喷出了一股腐蚀性的液体，灼坏了你的脸。你的眼前立刻什么都看不见了，浑身不断抽搐着。剧烈的痉挛攫住了你的喉咙，让你无法呼吸。你的身体在痛苦中挣扎，周围所有的光都立刻消失不见了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus's rib cage opens wide, the skin around it tearing with a wet squelch. You catch a glimpse of his internal organs coated with a strange film and riddled with shapeless growths and mushroom-like tumours. Where one would expect to see a heart, you see instead a glistening, translucent mollusc that has attached itself to the xenos's veins. The revolting thing lets out a groan, and a stream of caustic liquid burns your face. Blinded, you start thrashing as a horrible spasm seizes your throat and prevents you from breathing and your body convulses in pain. The light around you instantly fades.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La cage thoracique de l'hémoncule s'ouvre en grand et sa peau se déchire avec un bruit de succion, exposant ses organes, qui sont recouverts d'une étrange substance ainsi que d'excroissances informes et de tumeurs en forme de champignon. À la place d'un cœur se trouve un mollusque translucide et luisant qui semble s'être agrippé aux veines du xénos. L'ignominie laisse échapper un grognement et un jet de liquide caustique vous brûle le visage. Vous n'y voyez plus rien. Votre gorge est prise de terribles spasmes. Vous ne pouvez plus respirer et votre corps est en proie à des convulsions. Autour de vous, la lumière disparaît peu à peu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus's rib cage opens wide, the skin around it tearing with a wet squelch. You catch a glimpse of his internal organs coated with a strange film and riddled with shapeless growths and mushroom-like tumours. Where one would expect to see a heart, you see instead a glistening, translucent mollusc that has attached itself to the xenos's veins. The revolting thing lets out a groan, and a stream of caustic liquid burns your face. Blinded, you start thrashing as a horrible spasm seizes your throat and prevents you from breathing and your body convulses in pain. The light around you instantly fades.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La caja torácica del Hemónculo se abre de par en par, desgarrando la piel que la rodea con un chapoteo. Ves sus órganos internos, cubiertos de una extraña película y repleto de bultos extraños y tumores similares a setas. Donde cabría esperar un corazón, ves un molusco reluciente y translúcido que se ha acoplado a las venas del xenos. El repugnante ser gime y un chorro de líquido cáustico te quema la cara. Cegad{mf|o|a}, empiezas a debatirte y tu garganta se obstruye, impidiéndote respirar. Tu cuerpo convulsiona de dolor. La luz que te rodea desaparece de inmediato.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus's rib cage opens wide, the skin around it tearing with a wet squelch. You catch a glimpse of his internal organs coated with a strange film and riddled with shapeless growths and mushroom-like tumours. Where one would expect to see a heart, you see instead a glistening, translucent mollusc that has attached itself to the xenos's veins. The revolting thing lets out a groan, and a stream of caustic liquid burns your face. Blinded, you start thrashing as a horrible spasm seizes your throat and prevents you from breathing and your body convulses in pain. The light around you instantly fades.{/n}

Ves sus órganos internos, cubiertos de una extraña película y repleto de bultos extraños y tumores similares a setas. Donde cabría esperar un corazón, ves un molusco reluciente y translúcido que se ha acoplado a las venas del xenos. El repugnante ser gime y un chorro de líquido cáustico te quema la cara. Cegad{mf|o|a}, empiezas a debatirte y tu garganta se obstruye, impidiéndote respirar. Tu cuerpo convulsiona de dolor. La luz que te rodea desaparece de inmediato.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Brustkorb des Haemonculus öffnet sich und die Haut, die ihn umgibt, reißt mit einem schmatzenden Geräusch. Du erhaschst einen Blick auf seine von einem seltsamen Film überzogenen Organe, die mit formlosen Geschwüren und pilzähnlichen Tumoren übersät sind. Wo man ein Herz vermuten würde, siehst du einen durchsichtigen Mollusken, der sich an die Venen des Xenos zu klammern scheint. Das abscheuliche Ding stößt ein Stöhnen aus und verbrennt dir mit einer ätzenden Flüssigkeit das Gesicht. Du schlägst geblendet um dich, als dich deine verkrampfende Kehle am Atmen hindert und dein Körper sich vor Schmerzen windet. Das Licht, das dich umgibt, verblasst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus's rib cage opens wide, the skin around it tearing with a wet squelch. You catch a glimpse of his internal organs coated with a strange film and riddled with shapeless growths and mushroom-like tumours. Where one would expect to see a heart, you see instead a glistening, translucent mollusc that has attached itself to the xenos's veins. The revolting thing lets out a groan, and a stream of caustic liquid burns your face. Blinded, you start thrashing as a horrible spasm seizes your throat and prevents you from breathing and your body convulses in pain. The light around you instantly fades.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Haimonkulus'un kaburgaları ayrılıyor. Çevresindeki deri, ıslak bir balçık gibi yarılıyor. Tuhaf bir dokuyla kaplanmış, biçimsiz kabartılarla ve mantara benzer tümörlerle örtülü iç organlarını görüyorsun. Zenonun kalbinin olması gereken yerde; damarlarına yapışmış, yarı saydam bir yumuşakça var. Mide bulandırıcı varlıktan bir inilti çıkıyor. İçindeki bir sıvının buharı, yüzünü yakıyor. Görme yetini kaybediyorsun, korkunç kasılmalar boğazını kaplıyor ve ne kadar çabalasan da nefes almayı başaramıyorsun. Bedenin acıyla sarsılıyor ve etrafındaki ışık bir anda sönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus's rib cage opens wide, the skin around it tearing with a wet squelch. You catch a glimpse of his internal organs coated with a strange film and riddled with shapeless growths and mushroom-like tumours. Where one would expect to see a heart, you see instead a glistening, translucent mollusc that has attached itself to the xenos's veins. The revolting thing lets out a groan, and a stream of caustic liquid burns your face. Blinded, you start thrashing as a horrible spasm seizes your throat and prevents you from breathing and your body convulses in pain. The light around you instantly fades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Haimonkulus'un kaburgaları ayrılıyor, çevresindeki deri ıslak bir balçık gibi yarılıyor. Tuhaf bir dokuyla kaplanmış ve biçimsiz kabartılarla ve mantara benzer tümörlerle örtülü iç organlarını görüyorsun. Zenonun kalbinin olması gereken yerde, damarlarına yapışmış, yarı saydam bir yumuşakça var. Mide bulandırıcı varlıktan bir inilti çıkıyor ve içindeki bir sıvıdan çıkan buhar nedeniyle yüzün yanıyor. Görme yetini kaybediyorsun, korkunç kasılmalar boğazını kaplıyor ve ne kadar çabalasan da nefes almayı başaramıyorsun. Bedenin acıyla sarsılıyor ve etrafındaki ışık bir anda sönüyor.{/n}
